author: werken
msg: Improved the lexing on strings to allow for $${foo} literals to be
passed (double that dollar!), and for things like ${ a.b("}") }
to no longer trick jelly into finding the end of the expression
Plus, modified slightly to support the maven-ng moving target.

author: werken
msg: If you define a <goal> in maven.xml, it must be within a <project> tag.

author: jstrachan
msg: added use of the <jelly> task to generate the tag documentation

author: jstrachan
msg: added correct unit testing patterns for maven-ng
